Header.title: JAPAN VIETNAM TRADING BRIDGE CO. LTD
Header.paragraph: The trading bridge between Japan and Vietnam

About.paragraph: Japan Vietnam Trading Bridge is a trading company in Hanoi, Vietnam. We established longer and closer working relationships with our clients and suppliers in both Vietnam and Japan not only provide immediate and reliable services but to continually exceed expectations and goals. We create commercial flows, import and export products, arranging and managing international projects with our partners. Supported our network, we are able to integrate all these functions with our fruitful experience. Our numerous competencies allow us to respond to the needs of industries looking for a new market. We look forward to becoming the “bridge” connecting the trading between the two countries.
Why: Professional consulting service from experts with long experience of trading between Japan and Vietnam.
Have office and contact person in both Tokyo, Japan and Hanoi, Vietnam
Why2: Large relationship network with many suppliers, clients and authorities in both two countries

Services.name: General Trading
Services.text: Full service wholesale daily goods and consumption good distributor.

Services.name: Import & Export Service
Services.text: JVTB is offering import & export service from/to East Asia, Europe, South America, Africa, Middle East and the Carribean Islands.
